head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WORMSER, ALVIN RAYMOND

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WORMSER, ALVIN RAYMOND

block.p: WORMSER--Alvin Raymond. Passed away peacefully on April 29th, 2007. Husband of the late Betty Login Wormser, father of Ann Owens (John) and Nancy Wormser, ''Poppie'' of beloved grandchildren, Emily, Kevin and Julie. Family will receive friends on Tuesday May 1st, 2007 from 3pm to 8pm at 6040 Boulevard East in West New York, NJ. Cremation services will be private.
